value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The townspeople... Are they all right?
Oh, I hope so...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Thanks to your brother's quick
thinking, they will be. They'll all have
escaped by now. I'm sure of it.$k$p$EFace_Anger|We're the ones who need to get
moving—before the enemy's scouts
catch up with us.$k$pThis will be a hard march over
treacherous ground... There's nothing
but snow, as far as the eye can see.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Snow, as far as the eye can see... So
this is Nifl. I hope this land really does
hold the key to defeating Surtr...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Well, I'm just hoping to get out of
the—achoo!—the cold... Brr!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Is it really that cold? Today is rather...
temperate.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Not for us. We've got to stick together
and shield each other from the wind.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|We must be careful. Nifl was
decimated by the forces of Múspell.$k$pLaegjarn, one of Surtr's most trusted
generals, has set up camp here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hear that? That means this is enemy
territory. Stay alert.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Even so, my sister, Gunnthrá, has
managed to elude them. She is in
hiding here, and she's waiting for us...$k$pBefore anything else, we must meet
up with her, and—$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|No! They're already here. Get ready
to fight!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Royals of Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I've seen her before—she's one of
Surtr's underlings!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Laevatein... You've been following us.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Those...are my orders. To track you,
and to kill you.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Too strong...$k$pCan't die here... I'll retreat... That's
what she said to do...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|There's our opportunity! Let's get out
of here, troops!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That's easy for you to say! It's so hard
to move through all this snow...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'll forge the path. Follow in my
footsteps. Though that does mean
we'll be leaving a trail...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We don't have a choice—we'll just
have to erase it as we go.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Wait a minute... No, we won't.
Leave a trail.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What's that? Now you WANT a trail?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We've got hunters on our tail... So we
must be as cunning as beasts.$k$pWe'll lay a fake trail, double back, and
then head in another direction—all the
while erasing the new trail.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'm impressed! Using our wits...we
can win!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|There's a reason I'm the commander!
If I know one thing, it's how to sneak
a squad through enemy territory...$k$pLet's go!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|So much snow... So cold.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_04,0|$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Laevatein.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Laegjarn!$k$pYou're here... I'm so glad.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Me too, little sister. Me too. It's good
to be reunited.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Father gave me orders...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|So I've heard. More bloodshed is on
its way.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Laegjarn...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hey, now. No need to worry, OK?
Do you know where they went?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|I lost them... But there are footprints.
Take a look...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|See? It's not so bad after all. We'll
find them in no time. We just have to
hurry...$k$p$EFace|Hmm... Or do we?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|What's wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|There's something about these
prints...$k$pThey're so...clear. Even covered by
fresh snowfall, they stand out.$k$pIf their goal is to escape us...they
should want their tracks covered by
the falling snow...$k$pBut these prints... It's like they want
us to see them.$k$pWhat do you think?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|They did it on purpose. To trick us.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Let's try to think like the Askrans.$k$pThey're in unfamiliar territory—enemy
territory. And they barely made their
escape.$k$pWhat they want most is to evade us.
If we find them, they're lost. So they
can't afford to leave a trail...$k$pWhat to do? They erase their
footprints and hide, hoping that the
enemy will pass them by...$k$pWe'll ignore this fake trail. Instead, we
will search the area. Thoroughly.$k$pThey can't be moving fast if they're
erasing their real trail, so we'll be
able to catch up to them.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You must be right, Laegjarn. You're
so clever.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|And you're very sweet, Laevatein.
You've always been such a good
girl...$k$pNow, let's go. There's no way they
can hide—not when faced with a pair
of Múspell's generals.$k$pSuch easy prey... I almost feel sorry
for them.$k$p$Sbs150|
